law.catch_line: Conformance of legal advertisements to federal laws or regulations.
law.text: Notwithstanding the provisions of KRS 424.130, the cabinet may publish advertisements in conformance with the requirements of an applicable federal law or federal regulation. However, if the federal law or regulation requires the cabinet to publish an advertisement more than sixty (60) days in advance of the occurrence of an act, opportunity or event specified in KRS 424.130, the cabinet shall publish one (1) additional advertisement within the time period required by KRS 424.130.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 355, sec. 6, effective June 21, 1974.
